00035 namespace Ogre
00036 {
00037 
00055     class _OgreExport PSSMShadowCameraSetup : public Ogre::LiSPSMShadowCameraSetup
00056     {
00057     public:
00058         typedef vector<Real>::type SplitPointList;
00059         typedef vector<Real>::type OptimalAdjustFactorList;
00060 
00061     protected:
00062         size_t mSplitCount;
00063         SplitPointList mSplitPoints;
00064         OptimalAdjustFactorList mOptimalAdjustFactors;
00065         Real mSplitPadding;
00066 
00067         mutable size_t mCurrentIteration;
00068 
00069     public:
00071         PSSMShadowCameraSetup();
00072         ~PSSMShadowCameraSetup();
00073 
00080         void calculateSplitPoints(size_t splitCount, Real nearDist, Real farDist, Real lambda = 0.95);
00081 
00088         void setSplitPoints(const SplitPointList& newSplitPoints);
00089 
00093         void setOptimalAdjustFactor(size_t splitIndex, Real factor);
00094 
00098         void setSplitPadding(Real pad) { mSplitPadding = pad; }
00099 
00103         Real getSplitPadding() const { return mSplitPadding; }
00105         size_t getSplitCount() const { return mSplitCount; }
00106 
00108         virtual void getShadowCamera(const Ogre::SceneManager *sm, const Ogre::Camera *cam,
00109             const Ogre::Viewport *vp, const Ogre::Light *light, Ogre::Camera *texCam, size_t iteration) const;
00110 
00112         inline const SplitPointList& getSplitPoints() const
00113         { return mSplitPoints; }
00114 
00116         inline Real getOptimalAdjustFactor(size_t splitIndex) const
00117         { return mOptimalAdjustFactors[splitIndex]; }
00118 
00120         Real getOptimalAdjustFactor() const;
00121 
00122     };
